rainlight: Follow https://www.twitch.tv/rainlight_studios for awesome gamedev content. Also check out their Multiplayer Hide and Seek game TrickyTracks on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2122000/Tricky_Tracks__Early_Access/

bardy: The Unwanted War now has a store page and you can wishlist it here https://store.steampowered.com/app/2487370/The_Unwanted_War/ - He also doing entertaining game-dev streams here on twitch, so please follow: https://www.twitch.tv/bardaky
basti: You like Godot (ofc you do!). And you want to see a cool game about retired pirates? Then I can highly recommend https://www.twitch.tv/b4zzzing
tompson: Remember the good old Gameboy Classic vibes or want to know how games looked like before colors were invented? Also you like Godot and 2D? Then checkout https://www.twitch.tv/tompsoncode
profitz: You want to learn in an entertaining way how to survive or ride dinos (guess not only limited to games)? Then you have to follow this aweseome guy: https://www.twitch.tv/profitztv
iraddev: If you ever wanted to see how a great tower defense game is made in godot then you should go and follow the famous iRadDev: https://www.twitch.tv/iraddev
n3rkmind: If you like to see how a multiplayer survival progression game is made in unity then join and follow the amazing n3rkmind: https://www.twitch.tv/n3rkmind
coder2k: May the biggest german dev streamer on twitch. He does a lot of awesome stuff with programming langauges. So join in: https://www.twitch.tv/coder2k
clayn: Wanna see a german dude streaming games instead of streaming how he hurts himself trying to build up ikea? Then check out https://www.twitch.tv/claynosmato
bytewelt: How does a stream look like if the streamer is too lazy to stream? - Check out bytewelt to see how a printer is doing more work than the streamer: https://www.twitch.tv/bytewelt
